text: description にコミットIDが入っててアレだけど、ひとまずインストーラに署名出来たっぽいね。 <https://github.com/vim/vim/issues/1142>

attachments.title: Add Digital Signature for windows version · Issue #1142 · vim/vim
attachments.text: PuTTY have been add it since 0.67 To help protect against tampering in transit from our website or after downloading, I think it's necessery to add it.

text: CIで自動で署名が付くのはまだx64のみ、しかもGitHub ReleasesへのアップロードはChristian氏による手動ですがｗ
